interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: True Blood Forsaken Rollerball Duo Review Date: 2023/02/23 Store: Forsaken Product Description: ['An irresistible mix of dark and light elements, Forsaken will have creatures of the night flocking to you like a vampire to faerie blood. This bewitching scent features top notes of dark blackberry, Anjou pear, and blood orange; middle notes of night blooming jasmine, sheer violet, and black plum; and bottom notes of ebony wood, amber crystals, patchouli, and vanilla. Enrobe yourself in Forsaken eau de parfum with this Roller Ball Duo, and effortlessly enchant everyone around you.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Forsaken', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Forsaken', 'Special Feature': 'Gift, TSA Compliant, Travel Perfume, Rollerball Perfume', 'Manufacturer': 'True Blood'} Review Text: This is a very light, spicy fragrance.
I have to pry open the roller ball, slightly, to get more out of the bottle (otherwise it barely comes out.) Review Title: Light 👃🏼🥰 Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Banana Comb Hair Clips - Set of 4 Locking Clasp Hairclips The Paragon {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.4 x 2.6 x 0.9 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} These work only if one has fine hair. I have shoulder length, really thick hair, and the first time I tried one of them, it totally broke in half. So now thy’ll go in the “X-Mas Socking Stuffer” bag. Too Frail New Look - The Fay Farm's Organic Healing Hemp Lotion - 8 oz. The Fay Farm, LLC {'Brand': 'The Fay Farm, LLC', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Whole Body', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 2.5 x 5.75 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '853618002405'} I’ve had severe back aches for about 3 years now-sometimes where my back freezes up and I can’t even stand up. I’m sick of pills,so when I came upon this lotion, it was really amazing. I didn’t realize what it was advertised for, so I just thought it’s for relieving pain. My “mistake” ended up freeing me of muscle pain and back cramps. It smells great too (like lavender, even though there’s none in it).
It’s like a masseus in a bottle. Great for Muscle Aches Soft & Dri Womens Soft scent Antiperspirant 3.5 fl oz/ 102g (Pack of 3) Soft & Dri {'Brand': 'Soft & Dri', 'Unit Count': '3.5 Ounce', 'Item Volume': '3.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.5 x 1.9 inches; 10.4 Ounces'} I’ve been using this product since 1978, and I was totally bummed out when it was removed off the shelves.
It really keeps you dry, and smells so good.
I’m just glad to be able to buy it here. Great 👍🏻 VILLATONE Large Makeup Mirror with Lights and Magnification (Detachable Spot 10X Cosmetic Mirror). 360° Rotation. Touch Screen Brightness Dimming. Lighted Vanity Mirror for Make Up with LED Lighting VILLATONE {'Brand': 'VILLATONE', 'Shape': 'Rectangular, Round', 'Frame Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene (ABS)', 'Mounting Type': 'Countertop Mount, Tabletop Mount', 'Special Feature': 'magnifying, dimmable, lighted', 'Product Dimensions': '10 x 6 x 1 inches; 1.21 Pounds'} This is the correct size, maneuverable, and sheds enough light to put on your makeup.
I didn’t receive the usb cord that was supposed to come with it, so I’ve had to use batteries, but that works as well. It’s bright 💁🏻‍♀️ 4 Point Eyebrow Pen, Micro Ink Brow Pen Waterproof Eyebrow Pencil With Micro-Fork Tips for Daily Natural Eye Brown Makeup Lunana Beauty {'Brand': 'Lunana Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '2 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '763944352085'} My hair is dyed an unusual color, and the dark gray pen looks so much better than the common brown one.
It’s just as easy to use as any other tattoo eyebrow pens, plus it’s waterproof.
I also received several other eyebrow tools that came with it.
It’s a terrific deal that’s really useful! Great 🤗 Lime Crime 10th Birthday Unicorn Lipstick, Candy Floss - Long-Lasting Rose Pink Creamy Matte Lippie - 0.12oz Lime Crime {'Brand': 'Lime Crime', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 0.9 x 0.9 inches; 0.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '816652023669'} This is the perfect bright pink shade ever!
It’s beautiful, and doesn’t fray around my lips.
I’ve purchased many lipsticks from Lime Crime, and they never disappoint! Love it🤗 KAJA Brow Blowout | Fiber Gel Brow Definer | Waterproof, Smudge-proof Brow Tint | 02 Soft Brown | Vegan, Cruelty-free, Paraben-free, Sulfate-free, K-Beauty Kaja {'Brand': 'Kaja', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Benefits': 'Smudge Proof,Softening', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '0.43 x 0.43 x 3.86 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.43 x 3.86 inches; 0.81 Ounces'} This works better than the eyebrow “tattoo pens”.
It can be applied lightly, or thickly- and if it’s too thick or smears, I can blend it better, or wipe it off, with a q-tip.
It waterproof (great for sweaty/rainy days) but comes off, completely, with makeup remover, or face wash. Great 👍🏻 True Blood Forsaken Rollerball Duo Forsaken ['An irresistible mix of dark and light elements, Forsaken will have creatures of the night flocking to you like a vampire to faerie blood. This bewitching scent features top notes of dark blackberry, Anjou pear, and blood orange; middle notes of night blooming jasmine, sheer violet, and black plum; and bottom notes of ebony wood, amber crystals, patchouli, and vanilla. Enrobe yourself in Forsaken eau de parfum with this Roller Ball Duo, and effortlessly enchant everyone around you.'] {'Brand': 'Forsaken', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Forsaken', 'Special Feature': 'Gift, TSA Compliant, Travel Perfume, Rollerball Perfume', 'Manufacturer': 'True Blood'} This is a very light, spicy fragrance.
I have to pry open the roller ball, slightly, to get more out of the bottle (otherwise it barely comes out.) Light 👃🏼🥰

actual_interaction.title: Light 👃🏼🥰
actual_interaction.text:
This is a very light, spicy fragrance.
I have to pry open the roller ball, slightly, to get more out of the bottle (otherwise it barely comes out.)
features: True Blood Forsaken Eau De Parfum Rollerball Duo
Features Top Notes of Dark Blackberry, Anjou Pear, and Blood Orange.
Middle Notes: Night Blooming Jasmine, Sheer Violet, and Black Plum.
Base Notes: Ebony Wood, Amber Crystals, Patchouli, and Vanilla.
Packaging contains 2 Rollerballs (As Shown) - Manufacture Sealed
description: An irresistible mix of dark and light elements, Forsaken will have creatures of the night flocking to you like a vampire to faerie blood. This bewitching scent features top notes of dark blackberry, Anjou pear, and blood orange; middle notes of night blooming jasmine, sheer violet, and black plum; and bottom notes of ebony wood, amber crystals, patchouli, and vanilla. Enrobe yourself in Forsaken eau de parfum with this Roller Ball Duo, and effortlessly enchant everyone around you.

details.Special Feature: Gift, TSA Compliant, Travel Perfume, Rollerball Perfume
